structure.unit: RELIGIOUS, CHARITABLE, AND EDUCATIONAL SOCIETIES -- NONSTOCK, NONPROFIT CORPORATIONS

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 69, effective January 1, 2011. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 341, sec. 18, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 204, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 454, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 15.
